mapper.select: SELECT id, shelves_no, shelves_spec_id, wh_zone_id, remark, inner_org_id FROM wh_shelves where id = #{id}

SELECT sh.id, sh.shelves_no, sh.shelves_spec_id, sh.wh_zone_id, sh.remark, sp.spec_no, sp.single_layers_length, sp.single_layers_width, sp.single_layers_height, sp.layers_count, sp.single_layer_support_weight, sp.img_url FROM wh_shelves as sh INNER JOIN shelves_spec as sp ON sh.shelves_spec_id=sp.id where sh.wh_zone_id = #{kd.whZoneId} order by sh.shelves_no

SELECT id, shelves_no FROM wh_shelves WHERE (shelves_no = #{shelvesNo})
AND id != #{id}
